metadata.Title: CVE-2011-1579 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The checkCss function in includes/Sanitizer.php in the wikitext parser in MediaWiki before 1.16.3 does not properly validate Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) token sequences, which allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks or obtain sensitive information by using the \2f\2a and \2a\2f hex strings to surround CSS comments.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-1579` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.2-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.2-1').
